name: ani-grenoble-games-client
description: Client for the Ani Grenoble games

scripts.build: tsc --build src/app && tsc --build src/user/js && tsc --build src/admin/js && copyfiles -f src/user/html/**/*.html app_dist/user/html/ && copyfiles -f src/admin/html/**/*.html app_dist/admin/html/ && copyfiles -f src/user/css/*.css app_dist/user/css/ && copyfiles -f src/admin/css/*.css app_dist/admin/css/ && copyfiles -f src/user/audio/* app_dist/user/audio/ && copyfiles -f src/user/img/*.jpg app_dist/user/img/ && copyfiles -f src/user/img/*.png app_dist/user/img/ && copyfiles -f src/admin/img/*.jpg app_dist/admin/img/ && copyfiles -f src/admin/img/*.png app_dist/admin/img/ && copyfiles -f src/user/three/* app_dist/user/three/

author: Gael GC
